title: How do I view my phone's data service status or turn off the data service?
answer:
Drag the notification bar downward: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112867) indicates that the data service is turned on. To turn off the data service, touch this icon. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112868) indicates that the data service is turned off. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112869) indicates that the data service is turned off. To turn on the data service, touch this icon. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112870) indicates that the data service is turned on.
